title: Ping problem
body: I wanted to ask you guys if you have a ping problem since last 4-5 days, I was consistently at 36 now it's raging from 80 to 160 ping and the game is unplayable. I called my internet providers and they say everything is fine so I wondered if someone can help me?

replies.body: Sometimes ping issues are caused by some internet settings not being configured in the best way for League. Be sure to check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that might need to be updated. Test those changes in a custom match and let me know how it helps.

Heya Alek,

You may want to try the [Networking1](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) & [Networking2](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guides here and see if they help you fix your issue.

Good luck,

Galacius
